tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Tough Grader (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Great professor and great class, really learned a lot from this course. He keeps it simple and relatable to real life, his tests are challenging but they become easier as you study more.

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Tough Grader (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: I enjoyed taking Economics with Biehler, he keeps things interesting and always tries to relate class material to real life examples so it is easier to understand. He can be full of himself but I just think it\'s him being funny. He definitely can make you laugh. I wouldn\'t mind taking another class with this professor.

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Tough Grader (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: You don\'t always come across professors that seem to want their students to succeed as much as he do.

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Tough Grader (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: You don\'t always come across professors that seem to want their students to succeed as much as he does.

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Tough Grader (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Rushes through material and is arrogant. Yells at students for looking at the clock. Gives tests on chapters that have yet to be completed

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Tough Grader (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Really funny guy, made class a lot of fun. He also was super helpful- once before the first exam he held a review session for the class during the weekend. Sometimes lessons could get a little confusing, but the textbook helped clarify. Overall, good professor.

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Tough Grader (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Very arrogant, almost egotistical. He can and will point out very minor flaws and disregard your overall understanding. Anything but perfection will set him off. Would not recommend this professor, at all...

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Tough Grader (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: WORST PROFESSOR EVER!!!!!! DO NOT TAKE A CLASS WITH HIM!!!!!!! RUN AWAY FAST IF YOU HAVE A CHANCE...OR CHOOSE ANOTHER PROFESSOR!!!!! TERRIBLE! I WISH THERE WAS SOMETHING BETTER THAN CAPS TO EXPLAIN MY EXTREME DISLIKES FOR THIS PROFESSOR

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Tough Grader (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Notes are very dry, he copies them right on the overhead out of his binder. He has good reason though since basic economics really hasn\'t changed. He will often quiz off of questions at the end of the chapter in the book. Gets sidetracked with some weird- ass funny stories, but its a good break from class.

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Tough Grader (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: One of the best teachers I ever had. He brings reality to the classroom. His economic examples are current. He is very funny at times too.

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Tough Grader (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Great teacher. Funny and really easy grader. Often let the class decide when to have tests and whether they were take home or not. Take if you can.

tag_professor: Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  Tough Grader (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)
comments: Very arrogant, not helpful at all. claims to be very good at helping students but doesn\'t respond to emails. terrible grader, if you make any little mistake he docks off major points. he even went back and lowered grades even more. the only good thing is he teaches an online course so you don\'t have to see him or deal with him face to face.
